item.title: MAP Growth Math: Course-Specific Assessments Fact Sheet
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
MAP® Growth™ assessments for math provide teachers with valuable data on student growth in specific math courses, whether aligned to NWEA® standards or Common Core State Standards (CCSS).

The post MAP Growth Math: Course-Specific Assessments Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
MAP® Growth assessments for math provide teachers with valuable data on student growth in specific math courses, whether aligned to NWEA® standards or Common Core State Standards (CCSS).

The post MAP Growth Math: Course-Specific Assessments Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.

item.title: Map Growth – Virtual Applying Reports Professional Learning Fact Sheet
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
Get the most out of your MAP Growth data and reports with this essential professional learning offering. Designed for small groups, this interactive virtual offering will help teachers apply MAP

The post Map Growth – Virtual Applying Reports Professional Learning Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
Get the most out of your MAP Growth data and reports with this essential professional learning offering. Designed for small groups, this interactive virtual offering will help teachers apply MAP Growth RIT scores to develop student goals, inform instructional decisions and engage with parents. These  two sessions are ideal for your first year as a MAP Growth partner.

The post Map Growth – Virtual Applying Reports Professional Learning Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.

item.title: MAP Skills Professional Learning Fact Sheet
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
Whether you’re new to MAP Skills or already apply the data in your instructional programs, our Professional Learning Consultants can help your teachers and intervention specialists deepen their understanding of

The post MAP Skills Professional Learning Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
Whether you’re new to MAP Skills or already apply the data in your instructional programs, our Professional Learning Consultants can help your teachers and intervention specialists deepen their understanding of the reports and personalized instruction. This fact sheet provides more detail about our available onsite and virtual workshops.

The post MAP Skills Professional Learning Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.

item.title: State Solutions Technical Fact Sheet
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
NWEA partners with states to fulfill the promise of the Every Student Succeeds Act (ESSA) by creating innovative assessment solutions that reveal multiple dimensions of student success and promote learning.

item.title: MAP Reading Fluency Fact Sheet
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
This fact sheet introduces a new way to quickly and accurately assess your K-3 readers. Learn how MAP® Reading Fluency™ enables teachers to efficiently measure oral reading fluency, foundational skills,

The post MAP Reading Fluency Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
This fact sheet introduces a new way to quickly and accurately assess your K-3 readers. Learn how MAP® Reading Fluency enables teachers to efficiently measure oral reading fluency, foundational skills, and reading comprehension – in about 20 minutes.

The post MAP Reading Fluency Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.
